briefTitle: Clinical Study of the Efficacy and Safety of BCD-178 and Perjeta® as Neoadjuvant Therapy of HER2-Positive Breast Cancer
officialTitle: A Double-Blind, Randomized Clinical Study of the Efficacy and Safety of BCD-178 and Perjeta® as Neoadjuvant Therapy of HER2-Positive Breast Cancer
primaryOutcomeMeasure: To compare the efficacy of BCD-178 and Perjeta as neoadjuvant therapy by studying the total pathological complete response (tpCR) rate
